pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rzpipe for PythonInteract with rizin using the `#!pipe` command or in standalone scriptsthat communicate with local or remote rizin via pipe, tcp or http.## Installation```sh$ pip install rzpipe```or```sh$ pip3 install rzpipe```## Usage example:```pythonimport rzpipepipe = rzpipe.open("/bin/ls")pipe.cmd('aa')print(pipe.cmd("afl"))print(pipe.cmdj("aflj")) # parses the JSON and returns a dict (note the lowercase j)print(pipe.cmdJ("ij").core.format) # parses the JSON and returns a namedtuple (note the uppercase J)pipe.quit()```
